cerebrum.function: Perception, learning, memory, and voluntary motor control

cerebellum.function: Coordinates balance, posture, and fine motor movements

brainstem.function: Controls autonomic functions including breathing and heart rate

optic_chiasm.function: Decussation of optic nerve fibers for binocular vision

cervical_spinal_cord.function: Neural pathways for neck and forelimbs

thoracic_spinal_cord.function: Neural pathways for trunk and intercostal muscles

lumbar_spinal_cord.function: Neural pathways for abdomen and hindlimbs

sacral_spinal_cord.function: Controls pelvic organs and tail base

nasal_cavity.function: Filters, warms, and humidifies inspired air

trachea.function: Conducts air between larynx and lungs

left_lung.function: Gas exchange (oxygen uptake, carbon dioxide removal)

right_lung.function: Gas exchange (oxygen uptake, carbon dioxide removal)

left_atrium.function: Receives oxygenated blood from pulmonary veins

right_atrium.function: Receives deoxygenated blood from systemic veins

left_ventricle.function: Pumps oxygenated blood into the aorta

right_ventricle.function: Pumps deoxygenated blood to the lungs

aortic_arch.function: Distributes oxygenated blood to systemic arteries

pulmonary_artery.function: Carries blood from right ventricle to lungs

esophagus.function: Transports food from pharynx to stomach

fundus.function: Stomach dome; reservoir and initial digestion

pylorus.function: Regulates gastric emptying into the duodenum

caudate_lobe.function: Liver subdivision contributing to hepatic functions

quadrate_lobe.function: Liver subdivision contributing to hepatic functions

pancreas.function: Secretes digestive enzymes and hormones (insulin, glucagon)

spleen.function: Filters blood, recycles RBCs, and supports immunity

renal_medulla.function: Concentrates urine via loops and collecting ducts

renal_pelvis.function: Collects urine from calyces to ureter

ureters.function: Transport urine from kidneys to bladder

uterine_horns.function: Fetal development sites in multiparous species

uterine_body.function: Connects horns to cervix; supports gestation

cervix.function: Barrier and gateway between uterus and vagina

left_thyroid_lobe.function: Secretes thyroid hormones to regulate metabolism

right_thyroid_lobe.function: Secretes thyroid hormones to regulate metabolism
